Interests

I enjoy spending time outdoors. During warmer months, I run, swim, and ride bicycle. As you might have noticed, I am training for the official triathlon course. I will participate in a real contest as soon as I am ready!

In the winter, I love skiing. After I learned how to use EDGE during the ride, I could not help but becoming an ardent skier! Then, last season, my girl friend taught me how to snowboard. It is always great to try something new. Though I am a clumsy novice right now, I will definitely do half-pipe tricks someday ; )
